item.title: 剑指offer Day-01
item.description: Every one is their God,if you give up on yourself,who else will save you?Every one is busy,some are busy livig,some are busy dying,and you, who are busy chasing fame and fortune,who are busy with daily necessities,try to stop to think a second:if your brain has been institutionalized?Where is your God?

item.title: 回溯算法(理论篇)
item.description: 回溯法也可以叫做回溯搜索法，它是一种搜索的方式。回溯是递归的副产品，只要有递归就会有回溯。同时也也要
